subject: Re: Return value from subroutine
body:
2007/4/18, Johnson, Reginald (GTI) :

>                        if ($_ eq /AVI/) {

Above is not right.
Maybe '$_ =~ /AVI/'  or  ' $_ eq "AVI" '?
